DOC.brief_summary: This study intend support previous positive result AeroForm™ Patient Controlled Tissue Expander System breast reconstruction
DOC.brief_title: Study AeroForm Tissue Expander Breast Reconstruction
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study provide performance safety data support clinical use AeroForm™ Patient Controlled Tissue Expander System breast reconstruction patient population broad selection criterion
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject female age 18 70 . 2 . Subject elect two stage breast reconstruction tissue expanders . 3 . Subject 's tissue amenable tissue expansion . 4 . Subject able provide write informed consent . 5 . Subject able willing comply study requirement . 6 . Subject physical , perceptual cognitive capacity understand manage home dose regimen . 1 . Subject residual gross malignancy follow mastectomy . 2 . Subject current infection intend expansion site . 3 . Subject clinically significant radiation fibrosis expansion site . 4 . Subject plan radiation intend expansion site time expander implant . 5 . Subject comorbid condition determine Investigator place subject increase risk complication ( e.g. , severe collagen vascular disease , poorly manage diabetes ) . 6 . Subject currently participate concurrent investigational drug device study . 7 . Subject current tobacco smoker . 8 . Subject overweight BMI > 33 . 9 . Subject currently implant electronic device pacemaker , defibrillator , neurostimulator device , drug infusion device . 10 . Subject pregnant planning become pregnant study period . 11 . Subject history psychological condition , drug alcohol misuse may interfere ability use device safely .
